body_html:
@MtDersvan @asimshankar At the moment the Kafka Op could be optionally built with ./configure (specify y):

Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Apache Kafka Platform support? [y/N]:

It is not part of the default configuration (only with customized build).

There were some issues with .so as the op requires linkage with core and bazel could not resolve the linkage.

That was the case a couple of months ago. I will take a look and see if it is possible to build a .so and load dynamically now.

body:
@MtDersvan @asimshankar At the moment the Kafka Op could be optionally built with ./configure (specify `y`):
```
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Apache Kafka Platform support? [y/N]: 
```

It is not part of the default configuration (only with customized build).

There were some issues with `.so` as the op requires linkage with core and bazel could not resolve the linkage.

That was the case a couple of months ago. I will take a look and see if it is possible to build a `.so` and load dynamically now.
